products.name: Sony PS5 PlayStation Console
products.description: Brace yourself for a whole new world of possibilities as the PS5 unleashes unparalleled power and innovation. Get ready to elevate your gaming experience to new heights with the Sony PlayStation 5 Console. Unleash the power of play, immerse yourself in stunning visuals, and explore a world of endless possibilities. With the PS5, gaming will never be the same again.

products.name: Apple Watch Ultra [GPS + Cellular 49 mm]
products.description: Rugged and capable, built to meet the demands of endurance athletes, outdoor adventurers and water sports enthusiasts â€” with a specialised strap for each. Up to 36 hours of battery life, plus all the Apple Watch features that help you stay healthy, safe and connected.

products.name: Google Pixel 7 Pro (12GB RAM | 128 GB ROM)
products.description: Experience smooth operation and brilliant user interface with the 5G-ready Google Pixel 7 Pro smartphone that comes loaded with breathtaking features. Google Tensor G2 makes Pixel 7 faster, more efficient, and more secure and it delivers even more helpful features. Furthermore, the Pixel 7 Pro triple rear camera system includes a 5x telephoto lens. The upgraded ultrawide lens with autofocus now powers Macro Focus. Also, the Pixel 7 Pro has a 30x Super Res Zoom for high-quality photos from far away. Moreover, the Pixel 7 Pro's 17.018 cm (6.7) Smooth Display makes everything stunning and immersive. It intelligently adjusts up to 120 Hz for smoother, more responsive performance.

products.name: iPhone 14 Pro Max (128 GB)
products.description: The phone comes with a 120 Hz refresh rate 6.70-inch touchscreen display offering a resolution of 2796x1290 pixels at a pixel density of 460 pixels per inch (ppi). The display sports Other for protection. iPhone 14 Pro Max is powered by a hexa-core Apple A16 Bionic processor. The iPhone 14 Pro Max supports wireless charging, as well as proprietary fast charging.

products.description: This Monkey D Luffy Figure is a well-made collectible toy. This figurine is an amazing piece for collection. Not only is it a great size, but it is made of a good quality material. It is a great decoration in any room.
